title: Ryze
body: So, i think imnot alone i saying this, but ryze needs either a rework, or a nerf into unplayablility, his passive and damage scaling make him a monster even a low levels where he just melts even tanks in fights. it hurts to have him in a game full stop. please do something about him riot, it is unhealthy.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This thread is better suited for the Gameplay & Strategy board, this board is for Help & Support with technical issues.
